repository.label: Repository

userestrict.head: Publication Rights
userestrict.p: Property rights reside with the repository. Literary rights reside with the creators of the documents or their heirs. To obtain permission to publish or reproduce, please contact the Public Services Librarian of the Dept. of Special Collections.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation:
prefercite.p: [Identification of item] Kent (England) Deeds, M0311, Dept. of Special Collections, Stanford University Libraries, Stanford, Calif.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: The documents come almost exclusively from Kent and involve several of the same families, tenures, towns, etc., over the space of 300 years. 89 Deeds, including 9 conveyances, assignments, leases, and mortgages (1400-1800). Primarily in Latin, some in English.
